Articles.Content:
![DwbyRM6.png](http://i.imgur.com/DwbyRM6.png)

![euV87Eb.png](http://i.imgur.com/euV87Eb.png)

A small set of parts for adding color to your explosions. Each emitter is a small engine that burns out after a few seconds. Emitters are under the Utility category.

Also includes a spare tank (fuel flow is all vessel)

[https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/972/HotRockets%20Fireworks%20pack](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/972/HotRockets%20Fireworks%20pack)

License: GPLv3 for HotRockets art assets

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-05T01:23:01Z" title="07/05/2015 01:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 5, 2015</time> by Nazari1382**
Awesome! 10chars
Beatiful and awesome ! Good luck in the future ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Haha! Awesome thing for today ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Thanks Nazari!
Does it require HotRockets, or is it standalone.

> 
> Does it require HotRockets, or is it standalone.

It doesn't require HotRockets but it does require [Smokescreen](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71630-1-0-SmokeScreen-2-6-4-Extended-FX-plugin-%28July-1st%29)

This mod could not have a better release date. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Happy fourth of Jully!!!

I thought fireworks were already in KSP, but called explosions.
